sources.full: Tasha's Crucible of Everything Else - Volume 2

optionalfeature.name: Floating Dodge Retreat
entries: As a reaction when a creature first comes within 5 feet of you or starts its turn within 5 feet of you, you can spend 2 ki points to jump a distance equal to your walking speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

optionalfeature.name: Prison of Ice
entries: As an action, you can spend 2 ki points to attempt to restrain a creature in ice. You target a creature you can see that is within 30 feet of you, which must succeed on a Strength saving throw or else be {@condition restrained}. A creature restrained in this way can use its action to repeat this saving throw, ending the effect on a success. A creature that starts its turn encased in this ice takes {@dice 1d6} cold damage. For every additional ki point you spend, you can target an additional creature.

optionalfeature.name: Shroud of the Clouds
entries: You can spend 1 ki point to cast {@spell fog cloud}.

optionalfeature.name: Stance of Shaking Worlds
entries: You can spend 1 ki points to cast {@spell earth tremor|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Cyclone of the Seven Winds
entries: You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell dust devil|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Fist of the Earth
entries: You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell Maximilian's earthen grasp|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Glory of the Morning Sun
entries: You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell scorching ray}

optionalfeature.name: Sight of the Clouds
entries: Fog, mist, rain, snow, and similar substances do not obscure your vision.

optionalfeature.name: Sight of the Metal Master
entries: You can spend 1 ki point to gain tremorsense for a range of 30 feet for 1 minute. For every additional ki point you spend, the radius increases by 30 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Vestment of the Southern Wind
entries: You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell warding wind|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Swell of Rising Waters
entries: You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell tidal wave|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Wave of Angered Wind Spirits
entries: You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell wind wall}

optionalfeature.name: Wave of Blinding Sands
entries: You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell wall of sand|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Wave of Slowing Waters
entries: You can spend 3 ki points to cast {@spell wall of water}.

optionalfeature.name: Mastery of Water
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell control water}.

optionalfeature.name: Sphere of Storm
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell storm sphere|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Sphere of Water
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell watery sphere|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Vestment of the Northern Lights
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell fire shield}

optionalfeature.name: Cyclone of the Seven Seas
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell maelstrom|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Dance of the Four Winds
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell steel wind strike|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Grasp of Hungry Fire
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell immolation|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Mastery of Air
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell control winds|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Mastery of Earth
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell move earth}.

optionalfeature.name: Prison of Earth
entries: You can spend 5 ki points to cast {@spell flesh to stone}

optionalfeature.name: Sphere of Ice
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell Otiluke's freezing sphere}.

optionalfeature.name: Vestments of the Elements
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell primordial ward|xge}.

optionalfeature.name: Wave of Frozen Tears
entries: You can spend 4 ki points to cast {@spell wall of ice}.

optionalfeature.name: Blessing of the Spider Queen
entries: You gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed, and you can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

optionalfeature.name: Legendary Sacrifice
entries: As a reaction when you make a saving throw, you can expend a warlock spell slot to succeed on the saving throw instead of rolling to determine an outcome. You cannot use this feature to succeed on a save you have already attempted and failed.

optionalfeature.name: Legendary Strike
entries: As a reaction when a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of you, you can take the Attack action or cast a cantrip that normally has a casting time of 1 action. Once you use this invocation, you cannot do so again until you finish a short rest.

optionalfeature.name: Mistbringer
entries: Fog, mist, rain, snow, dust, smoke, and similar substances do not obscure your vision, and you can cast {@spell fog cloud} once using a warlock spell slot. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Otherworldly Grace
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Acrobatics} skill, and your walking speed increases by 10 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Otherworldly Resilience
entries: As a bonus action, you can regain a number of hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + your Warlock level. You can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Otherworldly Strength
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} skill, and your melee weapon attacks deal double damage to objects and structures.

optionalfeature.name: Patron's Reach
entries: Your reach for melee attacks magically increases by 10 feet.

optionalfeature.name: Rejuvenate
entries: As a bonus action, you can regain a single expended Pact Magic spell slot. Once you use this feature, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.

optionalfeature.name: Whisperless
entries: You can cast {@spell silence} at will. You and your spells can ignore the effects of magical silence.
